content: I'm a final year Computer Science student at the University of Nottingham.
Although my main intrest is machine learning, most of my professional experience has been as a DevOps engineer.
I also enjoy writing techincal documentation such as creating runbooks and buidling dev tools utilising Docker and kubernetes. .
Another great interest of mine is low level programming, such as Rust and C++. Some of my previous projects have been building Rust HTTP servers and Cellular Automata Simulations in C++.
As a driven developer, I'm always looking for new challenges and opportunities to learn.
To connect with me on LinkedIn: LinkedIn.
Or to see my github contributions: GitHub.
You can find my CV over here => Curriculum Vitae.
{{Click}} on a section on the left to learn more about my {{work}} and past {{experiences}}.
You can also {{navigate}} through the sections using the {{arrow keys}} or {{Vim motions}}.
